title: Strengthening CS Practical Competencies: Sustainability Mathematics Project with Climate Change Exploration Team

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of intermediate-level courses in related fields or equivalent experience
context.additional_context: Service/Customer Engagement Role-Specific Competency Development Program

learning_goals: Learners can quantitatively describe environmental change trends by analyzing climate change data with mathematical tools (graphs, statistics)
Learners can mathematically model energy consumption pattern optimization problems and propose solutions through adventure learning missions
Learners can present sustainable lifestyle practices with numerical evidence through team-based project outcomes
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
